-- Megatron --

Since the Tripreds have come out, the autoguns can't fire. The 
Predacons had sucessfully dragged the Tripreds out to fight. Time for 
a tactics change.

"Predacons, deal with the Tripreds now, they've been effectively 
drawn out of hidin--" He is interrupted by Galvatron's challenge. 
Knowning he couldn't fight both leaders at once, this put him in a 
bind. Seeing Galvatron's forces fighting the Tripreds, he smiled.

"Looks like someone has a great ambition..." Megatron says to 
himself, "One which must be crushed..." Making sure that Tyrael isn't 
attacking him, he leaps into dragon form.

"Beast mode."

And he starts flying over to Galvatron. "You wish my position do 
you... in that case, defeat and obliteration are two things you're 
going to learn this day." Megatron transforms.

"MEGATRON, TERRORIZE." Armed and ready for battle, Megatron watches 
the upsur.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> As Meg's Predacons fire on the base's shields, Tyrael scans for the 
> shields. 86%. They can hold out longer. He dodges many shots from 
the 
> ground and sees that Galvatron is going against Megatron. Good, he 
> thinks, that'll occupy him.
> 
> The Tripred Major fires two massive blasts at Quilldart and 
> Wolfenstein, then swoops next to Skulletron and slashes twice with 
his 
> talons.
> 
> Tyrael: We shall see, Megatron... I won't go down without you 
anyways.
>
